channel.title: Gamers Galore Where The Fun Never Ends!
channel.description:
[CENTER]Banner
Gamers Galore is a Brand New RSPS, it has a fresh new economy. It strives to be a enjoyable game that doesn't revolve around earning money. We do regular updates, we plan on doing some major updates with new PvP Amour and Weapons and New Bosses.
LINKS: [URL=http://"http://gamers-galore.com/"]Website[/URL] [URL=http://"http://gamers-galore.com/forum/"]Forums[/URL] [URL=http://"http://gamers-galore.com/webclient.html"]Webclient[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.gamers-galore.com/client.jar"]Client Download [/URL]
FEATURES MINIGAMES: - Jad - Castle Wars With Reward Store - Duel Arena - Barrows - Pest Control - Barbarian Assault - Fight Caves - Fishing Trawler ALL SKILLS WORKING: - Including Basic Farming PKING: - Kill Streaks - Kill Death Ratio - Kill and Death Count - Bounty Rewards for killing a player with a Killstreak over 3 BOSSES: - KBD - GodWars Dungeon - Kalphite Queen - Dagganoth Bosses - Sea Troll Queen - Barrelchest MISC: - Custom Login Screen - Custom Loading Bar - Lottery System - 602/634 Data - 474 Maps - Player Options Tab - Working Clan Chat with Ranking, Banning, Kicking - PvP 5 Second Leave Timer - Clean Combat / PvP - ::Pure Command for Starters - Decent Monster Drops - Full Reporting - IPB Forums
MEDIA [spoiler] [IMG]http://gamers-galore.com/gg.png[/img]
[IMG]http://gamers-galore.com/gg1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://gamers-galore.com/gg2.png[/img]
[IMG]http://gamers-galore.com/gg3.png[/img]
[IMG]http://gamers-galore.com/gg4.png[/img]
[IMG]http://gamers-galore.com/gg5.png[/img]
[IMG]http://gamers-galore.com/gg6.png[/img]
[IMG]http://gamers-galore.com/gg7.png[/img]
[IMG]http://gamers-galore.com/gg8.png[/img] [/spoiler] More Media to come [/CENTER]

item.title: Gamers Galore Where The Fun Never Ends!
item.dc:creator: @Hixie Hixie
item.description:
@Hixie wrote:

[CENTER]Banner

Gamers Galore is a Brand New RSPS, it has a fresh new economy. It strives to be a enjoyable game that doesn’t revolve around earning money. We do regular updates, we plan on doing some major updates with new PvP Amour and Weapons and New Bosses.

LINKS:
[URL=http://“http://gamers-galore.com/”]Website[/URL]
[URL=http://“http://gamers-galore.com/forum/”]Forums[/URL]
[URL=http://“http://gamers-galore.com/webclient.html”]Webclient[/URL]
[URL=http://“http://www.gamers-galore.com/client.jar”]Client Download [/URL]

FEATURES
MINIGAMES:

  • Jad
  • Castle Wars With Reward Store
  • Duel Arena
  • Barrows
  • Pest Control
  • Barbarian Assault
  • Fight Caves
  • Fishing Trawler
    ALL SKILLS WORKING:
  • Including Basic Farming
    PKING:
  • Kill Streaks
  • Kill Death Ratio
  • Kill and Death Count
  • Bounty Rewards for killing a player with a Killstreak over 3
    BOSSES:
  • KBD
  • GodWars Dungeon
  • Kalphite Queen
  • Dagganoth Bosses
  • Sea Troll Queen
  • Barrelchest
    MISC:
  • Custom Login Screen
  • Custom Loading Bar

  • 474 Maps
  • Player Options Tab
  • Working Clan Chat with Ranking, Banning, Kicking
  • PvP 5 Second Leave Timer
